English
Crunch Calhoun (Kurt Russell), a third rate motorcycle daredevil and semi-reformed
art thief, agrees to get back into the con game and pull off one final lucrative art
theft with his untrustworthy brother, Nicky (Matt Dillon). Reassembling the old team,
Crunch comes up with a plan to steal a priceless historical book, but the successful
heist leads to another far riskier plan devised by Nicky. They fail to realize each
other's separate agendas when their plan goes awry in this con movie about honor,
revenge and the bonds of brotherhood.
